org.drombler.commons.context

Interface Context

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContext, ContextWrapper, LocalProxyContext, ProxyContext, SimpleContext

    public interface Context
    A Context to find context-sensitive data.
    Author:
    puce

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void addContextListener(Class<T> type, ContextListener<T> listener)
      Registers a ContextListener for a specified type.
      <T> T find(Class<T> type)
      Finds an instance of the specified type in this context.
      <T> Collection<? extends T> findAll(Class<T> type)
      Finds all instances of the specified type in this context.
      <T> void removeContextListener(Class<T> type, ContextListener<T> listener)
      Unregisters a ContextListener for a specified type.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        <T> T find(Class<T> type)
        Finds an instance of the specified type in this context. If this context has more than one instance of the specified type, the first one found will be returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type
        Returns:
        the first instance found in this context with the specified type, or null if no instance was found. TODO: return Optional?

      • findAll

        <T> Collection<? extends T> findAll(Class<T> type)
        Finds all instances of the specified type in this context.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type
        Returns:
        a collection with all instances found in this context with the specified type, or an empty collection if no instance was found TODO: return List instead of Collection?
        TODO: return <T> instead of <? extends T>?

      • addContextListener

        <T> void addContextListener(Class<T> type,
                            ContextListener<T> listener)
        Registers a ContextListener for a specified type. The listener will be notified when instances of the specified type get added or removed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the type to listen for
        listener - the ContextListener

      • removeContextListener

        <T> void removeContextListener(Class<T> type,
                               ContextListener<T> listener)
        Unregisters a ContextListener for a specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the type to listen for
        listener - the ContextListener
